metadata.name: VIBE Coding Framework
metadata.description: Framework enabling non-technical users to create robust code specifications similar to Claude Skills but more dynamic and refactorable

vibe.target_users: Non-technical users, product managers, business analysts, entrepreneurs without coding knowledge
vibe.core_challenge: How to build a framework that helps non-coders create professional-grade specifications
vibe.inspiration: Claude Skills, but more robust and dynamic
vibe.meta_note: Meta-test: Using planning framework to build a coding framework

status.message: Project initialized. Migrated to v1alpha1 schema.
